Structs/SwiftBMLSDK_Query/SearchSpecific.name: any
Structs/SwiftBMLSDK_Query/SearchSpecific.abstract: This does not discriminate on any type of meeting. All available meetings are returned.

Structs/SwiftBMLSDK_Query/SearchSpecific.name: inPerson(isExclusive:)
Structs/SwiftBMLSDK_Query/SearchSpecific.abstract: This returns only meetings that have a physical address.

Structs/SwiftBMLSDK_Query/SearchSpecific.name: virtual(isExclusive:)
Structs/SwiftBMLSDK_Query/SearchSpecific.abstract: This returns only meetings that have a virtual component.

Structs/SwiftBMLSDK_Query/SearchSpecific.name: hybrid
Structs/SwiftBMLSDK_Query/SearchSpecific.abstract: This returns only meetings that have both a physical and a virtual component.

Structs/SwiftBMLSDK_Query/SearchSpecific.name: pageSize
Structs/SwiftBMLSDK_Query/SearchSpecific.abstract: The number of results per page. If this is 0, then no results are returned, and only the meta is populated. If left out, or set to a negative number, then all results are returned in one page.

Structs/SwiftBMLSDK_Query/SearchSpecific.name: pageNumber
Structs/SwiftBMLSDK_Query/SearchSpecific.abstract: The page number (0-based). If pageSize is 0 or less, this is ignored. If over the maximum number of pages, an empty page is returned.

Structs/SwiftBMLSDK_Query/SearchSpecific.name: locationRadius
Structs/SwiftBMLSDK_Query/SearchSpecific.abstract: The radius, in meters, of a location-based search. If this is 0 (or negative), then there will not be a location-based search. Ignored if the type is exclusive virtual.

Structs/SwiftBMLSDK_Query/SearchSpecific.name: locationCenter
Structs/SwiftBMLSDK_Query/SearchSpecific.abstract: The center of a location-based search. If locationRadius is 0, or less, then this is ignored. It also must be a valid long/lat, or there will not be a location-based search. Ignored if the type is exclusive virtual.

Structs/SwiftBMLSDK_Query/SearchSpecific.name: meetingIDs
Structs/SwiftBMLSDK_Query/SearchSpecific.abstract: This returns only meetings that have specific IDs. If this is not empty, then all the other specification parameters are ignored.

Structs/SwiftBMLSDK_Query/SearchSpecific.name: init(type:locationCenter:locationRadius:meetingIDs:pageSize:page:)
Structs/SwiftBMLSDK_Query/SearchSpecific.abstract: This is the default initializer. All parameters are optional, with blank/none defaults.

Structs/SwiftBMLSDK_Query/ServerInfo/Ser.name: entryPointURI
Structs/SwiftBMLSDK_Query/ServerInfo/Ser.abstract: The URI of the server access entrypoint.

Structs/SwiftBMLSDK_Query/ServerInfo/Ser.name: numberOfMeetings
Structs/SwiftBMLSDK_Query/ServerInfo/Ser.abstract: The number of meetings provided by this server.

Structs/SwiftBMLSDK_Query/ServerInfo/Ser.name: Server
Structs/SwiftBMLSDK_Query/ServerInfo/Ser.abstract: This is the information for each server that provides the service.

Structs/SwiftBMLSDK_Query/ServerInfo/Ser.name: servers
Structs/SwiftBMLSDK_Query/ServerInfo/Ser.abstract: An array of servers that are provided by this service.

Structs/SwiftBMLSDK_Query/ServerInfo/Ser.name: Service
Structs/SwiftBMLSDK_Query/ServerInfo/Ser.abstract: This breaks down the information for each type of service.

Structs/SwiftBMLSDK_Query/ServerInfo.htm.name: lastUpdate
Structs/SwiftBMLSDK_Query/ServerInfo.htm.abstract: The last time the aggregator ran an update.

Structs/SwiftBMLSDK_Query/ServerInfo.htm.name: totalMeetings
Structs/SwiftBMLSDK_Query/ServerInfo.htm.abstract: The total number of meetings in the server.

Structs/SwiftBMLSDK_Query/ServerInfo.htm.name: totalServers
Structs/SwiftBMLSDK_Query/ServerInfo.htm.abstract: The total number of servers reached by the server.

Structs/SwiftBMLSDK_Query.html#/s:11Swif.name: ServerInfoResultCompletion
Structs/SwiftBMLSDK_Query.html#/s:11Swif.abstract: This is the completion function for the server info query.

Structs/SwiftBMLSDK_Query.html#/s:11Swif.name: QueryResultCompletion
Structs/SwiftBMLSDK_Query.html#/s:11Swif.abstract: This is the completion function for the meeting search query.

Structs/SwiftBMLSDK_Query/ServerInfo.htm.name: ServerInfo
Structs/SwiftBMLSDK_Query/ServerInfo.htm.abstract: This is the response to the general server info query. It contains information about all the individual servers, represented by the aggregator server.

Structs/SwiftBMLSDK_Query/SearchSpecific.name: SearchSpecification
Structs/SwiftBMLSDK_Query/SearchSpecific.abstract: This struct is what we use to prescribe the search spec.

Structs/SwiftBMLSDK_Query.html#/s:11Swif.name: meetingSearch(specification:completion:)
Structs/SwiftBMLSDK_Query.html#/s:11Swif.abstract: This actually queries the server for a set of meetings, based on a SearchSpecification instance, and provides an instance of SwiftBMLSDK_Parser to a completion function.

Structs/SwiftBMLSDK_Query.html#/s:11Swif.name: meetingAutoRadiusSearch(minimumNumberOfResults:specification:completion:)
Structs/SwiftBMLSDK_Query.html#/s:11Swif.abstract: This actually queries the server for a set of meetings, based on a SearchSpecification instance, and provides an instance of SwiftBMLSDK_Parser to a completion function, but in this case, it does an auto-radius search, extending outwards from the search center (SearchSpecification.locationCenter), until the minimum number of meetings specified have been found. The SearchSpecification.locationRadius specification property is the maximum search radius (If the minimum amount have not been found, by the time the radius reaches this, the search stops, and the current results are returned).

Structs/SwiftBMLSDK_Parser/Meeting/Direc.name: appName
Structs/SwiftBMLSDK_Parser/Meeting/Direc.abstract: This returns a localization token for the app name.

Structs/SwiftBMLSDK_Parser/Meeting/Sorta.name: hybrid
Structs/SwiftBMLSDK_Parser/Meeting/Sorta.abstract: The meeting gathers, both in-person, and virtually, by both phone and video.

Structs/SwiftBMLSDK_Parser/Meeting/Sorta.name: hybrid_video
Structs/SwiftBMLSDK_Parser/Meeting/Sorta.abstract: The meeting gathers, both in-person, and virtually, but only via video.

Structs/SwiftBMLSDK_Parser/Meeting/Sorta.name: hybrid_phone
Structs/SwiftBMLSDK_Parser/Meeting/Sorta.abstract: The meeting gathers, both in-person, and virtually, but only via phone.

Structs/SwiftBMLSDK_Parser/Meeting/Sorta.name: virtual
Structs/SwiftBMLSDK_Parser/Meeting/Sorta.abstract: The meeting only gathers virtually, by both phone and video.

Structs/SwiftBMLSDK_Parser/Meeting/Sorta.name: virtual_video
Structs/SwiftBMLSDK_Parser/Meeting/Sorta.abstract: The meeting only gathers virtually, and only by video.

Structs/SwiftBMLSDK_Parser/Meeting/Sorta.name: virtual_phone
Structs/SwiftBMLSDK_Parser/Meeting/Sorta.abstract: The meeting only gathers virtually, and only by phone.

Structs/SwiftBMLSDK_Parser/Meeting/Meeti.name: hybrid
Structs/SwiftBMLSDK_Parser/Meeting/Meeti.abstract: The meeting gathers, both in-person, and virtually.

Structs/SwiftBMLSDK_Parser/Meeting/Forma.name: name
Structs/SwiftBMLSDK_Parser/Meeting/Forma.abstract: This is the short name for the format.

Structs/SwiftBMLSDK_Parser/Meeting/Forma.name: description
Structs/SwiftBMLSDK_Parser/Meeting/Forma.abstract: This is the longer description of the format.

Structs/SwiftBMLSDK_Parser/Meeting/Forma.name: language
Structs/SwiftBMLSDK_Parser/Meeting/Forma.abstract: This is the ISO 639-2 code for the language used for the name and description.

Structs/SwiftBMLSDK_Parser/Meeting/Forma.name: id
Structs/SwiftBMLSDK_Parser/Meeting/Forma.abstract: This is the local server format ID.

Structs/SwiftBMLSDK_Parser/Meeting/Forma.name: asString
Structs/SwiftBMLSDK_Parser/Meeting/Forma.abstract: Returns the format, as single string, with values separarated by tabs.
We simply sort by key, so there’s consistency in the ordering.

Structs/SwiftBMLSDK_Parser/Meeting/Forma.name: debugDescription
Structs/SwiftBMLSDK_Parser/Meeting/Forma.abstract: Returns a simple textual description of the data.

Structs/SwiftBMLSDK_Parser/Meeting/Forma.name: Format
Structs/SwiftBMLSDK_Parser/Meeting/Forma.abstract: This struct holds a parsed format information instance.

Structs/SwiftBMLSDK_Parser/Meeting.html#.name: oneWeekInSeconds
Structs/SwiftBMLSDK_Parser/Meeting.html#.abstract: This is how many seconds there are, in a week.

Structs/SwiftBMLSDK_Parser/Meeting/Meeti.name: MeetingType
Structs/SwiftBMLSDK_Parser/Meeting/Meeti.abstract: This provides values for the type of meeting.

Structs/SwiftBMLSDK_Parser/Meeting/Sorta.name: SortableMeetingType
Structs/SwiftBMLSDK_Parser/Meeting/Sorta.abstract: This has the type of meeting, but in a sortable manner.

Structs/SwiftBMLSDK_Parser/Meeting/Organ.name: Organization
Structs/SwiftBMLSDK_Parser/Meeting/Organ.abstract: This specifies the organization for the meeting.

Structs/SwiftBMLSDK_Parser/Meeting.html#.name: distanceInMeters
Structs/SwiftBMLSDK_Parser/Meeting.html#.abstract: The distance of this meeting, from the search center, or a specified “distance from” refinement. -1, if invalid.

Structs/SwiftBMLSDK_Parser/Meeting.html#.name: serverID
Structs/SwiftBMLSDK_Parser/Meeting.html#.abstract: This is the unique ID (within the found set) for the data source server.

Structs/SwiftBMLSDK_Parser/Meeting.html#.name: localMeetingID
Structs/SwiftBMLSDK_Parser/Meeting.html#.abstract: This is a unique ID (within the data source server) for this meeting.

Structs/SwiftBMLSDK_Parser/Meeting.html#.name: weekday
Structs/SwiftBMLSDK_Parser/Meeting.html#.abstract: This is a 1-based weekday index, with 1 being Sunday, and 7 being Saturday.

Structs/SwiftBMLSDK_Parser/Meeting.html#.name: startTime
Structs/SwiftBMLSDK_Parser/Meeting.html#.abstract: This is the time of day that the meeting starts (date-independent).

Structs/SwiftBMLSDK_Parser/Meeting.html#.name: duration
Structs/SwiftBMLSDK_Parser/Meeting.html#.abstract: This is the duration, in seconds, of the meeting.

Structs/SwiftBMLSDK_Parser/Meeting.html#.name: timeZone
Structs/SwiftBMLSDK_Parser/Meeting.html#.abstract: This is the local timezone of this meeting.

Structs/SwiftBMLSDK_Parser/Meeting.html#.name: name
Structs/SwiftBMLSDK_Parser/Meeting.html#.abstract: This is the name of the meeting.

Structs/SwiftBMLSDK_Parser/Meeting.html#.name: organization
Structs/SwiftBMLSDK_Parser/Meeting.html#.abstract: This is the organization to which this meeting belongs.

Structs/SwiftBMLSDK_Parser/Meeting.html#.name: formats
Structs/SwiftBMLSDK_Parser/Meeting.html#.abstract: This contains an array of formats that apply to the meeting.

Structs/SwiftBMLSDK_Parser/Meeting.html#.name: coords
Structs/SwiftBMLSDK_Parser/Meeting.html#.abstract: This is the physical location of this meeting, or a location used to determine local timezone. It is optional.

Structs/SwiftBMLSDK_Parser/Meeting.html#.name: comments
Structs/SwiftBMLSDK_Parser/Meeting.html#.abstract: This is any additional comments for the meeting. It is optional.

Structs/SwiftBMLSDK_Parser/Meeting.html#.name: inPersonVenueName
Structs/SwiftBMLSDK_Parser/Meeting.html#.abstract: This is the name for an in-person venue. It is optional.

Structs/SwiftBMLSDK_Parser/Meeting.html#.name: inPersonAddress
Structs/SwiftBMLSDK_Parser/Meeting.html#.abstract: This is a physical address of an in-person meeting. It is optional.

Structs/SwiftBMLSDK_Parser/Meeting.html#.name: locationInfo
Structs/SwiftBMLSDK_Parser/Meeting.html#.abstract: This is any additional text, describing the location. It is optional.

Structs/SwiftBMLSDK_Parser/Meeting.html#.name: virtualURL
Structs/SwiftBMLSDK_Parser/Meeting.html#.abstract: This is a URL for a virtual meeting. It is optional.

Structs/SwiftBMLSDK_Parser/Meeting.html#.name: virtualPhoneNumber
Structs/SwiftBMLSDK_Parser/Meeting.html#.abstract: This is a phone number for a virtual meeting. It is optional.

Structs/SwiftBMLSDK_Parser/Meeting.html#.name: virtualInfo
Structs/SwiftBMLSDK_Parser/Meeting.html#.abstract: This is any additional text, describing the virtual meeting. It is optional.

Structs/SwiftBMLSDK_Parser/Meeting.html#.name: id
Structs/SwiftBMLSDK_Parser/Meeting.html#.abstract: This is a unique ID (within the found set) for this meeting, based on the two local IDs.

Structs/SwiftBMLSDK_Parser/Meeting.html#.name: meetingType
Structs/SwiftBMLSDK_Parser/Meeting.html#.abstract: The meeting type.

Structs/SwiftBMLSDK_Parser/Meeting.html#.name: sortableMeetingType
Structs/SwiftBMLSDK_Parser/Meeting.html#.abstract: The meeting type, as a sortable value.

Structs/SwiftBMLSDK_Parser/Meeting.html#.name: integerStartTime
Structs/SwiftBMLSDK_Parser/Meeting.html#.abstract: The start time, in local meeting timezone, as a military-style integer (HHMM).

Structs/SwiftBMLSDK_Parser/Meeting.html#.name: adjustedIntegerStartTime
Structs/SwiftBMLSDK_Parser/Meeting.html#.abstract: The start time, adjusted to user timezone, as a military-style integer (HHMM).

Structs/SwiftBMLSDK_Parser/Meeting.html#.name: location
Structs/SwiftBMLSDK_Parser/Meeting.html#.abstract: Returns the meeting location as a CLLocation.

Structs/SwiftBMLSDK_Parser/Meeting.html#.name: distanceFrom(_:)
Structs/SwiftBMLSDK_Parser/Meeting.html#.abstract: This returns the distance between the instance, and another location, provided as coordinates.
Public Equatable Conformance

Structs/SwiftBMLSDK_Parser/Meeting.html#.name: hash(into:)
Structs/SwiftBMLSDK_Parser/Meeting.html#.abstract: Public Hashable Conformance

Structs/SwiftBMLSDK_Parser/Meeting.html#.name: description
Structs/SwiftBMLSDK_Parser/Meeting.html#.abstract: Public CustomStringConvertible Conformance

Structs/SwiftBMLSDK_Parser/Meeting.html#.name: debugDescription
Structs/SwiftBMLSDK_Parser/Meeting.html#.abstract: Public CustomDebugStringConvertible Conformance

Structs/SwiftBMLSDK_Parser/Meeting.html#.name: encode(to:)
Structs/SwiftBMLSDK_Parser/Meeting.html#.abstract: Encoder

Structs/SwiftBMLSDK_Parser/Meeting.html#.name: hasVirtual
Structs/SwiftBMLSDK_Parser/Meeting.html#.abstract: True, if the meeting has a virtual component.

Structs/SwiftBMLSDK_Parser/Meeting.html#.name: hasInPerson
Structs/SwiftBMLSDK_Parser/Meeting.html#.abstract: True, if the meeting has an in-person component.

Structs/SwiftBMLSDK_Parser/Meeting.html#.name: startTimeInSecondsFromMidnight
Structs/SwiftBMLSDK_Parser/Meeting.html#.abstract: This returns the start time as seconds from midnight.

Structs/SwiftBMLSDK_Parser/Meeting.html#.name: dateComponents
Structs/SwiftBMLSDK_Parser/Meeting.html#.abstract: This returns the start time and weekday as date components.

Structs/SwiftBMLSDK_Parser/Meeting.html#.name: basicInPersonAddress
Structs/SwiftBMLSDK_Parser/Meeting.html#.abstract: This returns the address as a basic readable address.

Structs/SwiftBMLSDK_Parser/Meeting.html#.name: distanceInMeters(from:)
Structs/SwiftBMLSDK_Parser/Meeting.html#.abstract: Returns the linear distance, in meters, between the input coordinate, and the meeting’s coordinate.

Structs/SwiftBMLSDK_Parser/Meeting.html#.name: nextMeetingIn
Structs/SwiftBMLSDK_Parser/Meeting.html#.abstract: Returns the number of seconds until the meeting starts (non-mutating. If the cache has not been updated, then this is not accurate).

Structs/SwiftBMLSDK_Parser/Meeting.html#.name: meetingStartsIn()
Structs/SwiftBMLSDK_Parser/Meeting.html#.abstract: Returns the number of seconds until the meeting starts.

Structs/SwiftBMLSDK_Parser/Meeting.html#.name: isMeetingInProgress()
Structs/SwiftBMLSDK_Parser/Meeting.html#.abstract: Returns true, if the meeting is currently in progress.

Structs/SwiftBMLSDK_Parser/Meeting.html#.name: getNextStartDate(isAdjusted:)
Structs/SwiftBMLSDK_Parser/Meeting.html#.abstract: This is the start time of the next meeting, in the meeting’s local timezone (unless isAdjusted is true).

Structs/SwiftBMLSDK_Parser/Meeting.html#.name: getPreviousStartDate(isAdjusted:)
Structs/SwiftBMLSDK_Parser/Meeting.html#.abstract: This is the start time of the previous meeting, in the meeting’s local timezone (unless isAdjusted is true).

Structs/SwiftBMLSDK_Parser/Meeting/Direc.name: DirectVirtual
Structs/SwiftBMLSDK_Parser/Meeting/Direc.abstract: This enum helps us to create direct (as in opening the app directly) URLs, for various services.

Structs/SwiftBMLSDK_Parser/Meeting.html#.name: directApp
Structs/SwiftBMLSDK_Parser/Meeting.html#.abstract: This returns the enum.

Structs/SwiftBMLSDK_Parser/Meeting.html#.name: directAppURI
Structs/SwiftBMLSDK_Parser/Meeting.html#.abstract: If the URL for the virtual meeting is one that can open an app on the user’s device, a direct URL scheme version of the URL is returned.

Structs/SwiftBMLSDK_Parser/Meeting.html#.name: directPhoneURI
Structs/SwiftBMLSDK_Parser/Meeting.html#.abstract: If we have a valid direct phone URL, it is returned here.

Structs/SwiftBMLSDK_Parser/PageMeta.html.name: actualSize
Structs/SwiftBMLSDK_Parser/PageMeta.html.abstract: This is the actual size of this single page of results, in results (not bytes).

Structs/SwiftBMLSDK_Parser/PageMeta.html.name: pageSize
Structs/SwiftBMLSDK_Parser/PageMeta.html.abstract: This is the number of results allowed as a maximum, per page, in results.

Structs/SwiftBMLSDK_Parser/PageMeta.html.name: startingIndex
Structs/SwiftBMLSDK_Parser/PageMeta.html.abstract: This is the 0-based starting index, of the total found set (in results), for this page.

Structs/SwiftBMLSDK_Parser/PageMeta.html.name: total
Structs/SwiftBMLSDK_Parser/PageMeta.html.abstract: This is the total size of all results in the found set.

Structs/SwiftBMLSDK_Parser/PageMeta.html.name: totalPages
Structs/SwiftBMLSDK_Parser/PageMeta.html.abstract: This is the total number of pages that contain the found set.

Structs/SwiftBMLSDK_Parser/PageMeta.html.name: page
Structs/SwiftBMLSDK_Parser/PageMeta.html.abstract: This is the 0-based index of this page of results.

Structs/SwiftBMLSDK_Parser/PageMeta.html.name: searchTime
Structs/SwiftBMLSDK_Parser/PageMeta.html.abstract: This is the number of seconds, reported by the server, to generate this page of results.

Structs/SwiftBMLSDK_Parser/PageMeta.html.name: PageMeta
Structs/SwiftBMLSDK_Parser/PageMeta.html.abstract: This struct holds metadata about the page of meeting results, as reported by the server.

Structs/SwiftBMLSDK_Parser/Meeting.html.name: Meeting
Structs/SwiftBMLSDK_Parser/Meeting.html.abstract: This struct holds a single parsed meeting instance.

Structs/SwiftBMLSDK_Parser.html#/s:11Swi.name: meta
Structs/SwiftBMLSDK_Parser.html#/s:11Swi.abstract: The page metadata for this page of meetings.

Structs/SwiftBMLSDK_Parser.html#/s:11Swi.name: meetings
Structs/SwiftBMLSDK_Parser.html#/s:11Swi.abstract: The meeting data for this page of meetings.

Structs/SwiftBMLSDK_Parser.html#/s:11Swi.name: inPersonMeetings
Structs/SwiftBMLSDK_Parser.html#/s:11Swi.abstract: Returns meetings that have an in-person component.

Structs/SwiftBMLSDK_Parser.html#/s:11Swi.name: virtualMeetings
Structs/SwiftBMLSDK_Parser.html#/s:11Swi.abstract: Returns meetings that have a virtual component.

Structs/SwiftBMLSDK_Parser.html.name: SwiftBMLSDK_Parser
Structs/SwiftBMLSDK_Parser.html.abstract: This struct will contain one page of results from a meeting search, and is one of the response parameters to the QueryResultCompletion completion callback.

Structs/SwiftBMLSDK_Query.html.name: SwiftBMLSDK_Query
Structs/SwiftBMLSDK_Query.html.abstract: This struct is for generating queries to instances of LGV_MeetingServer, and returning the parsed results.

Protocols/SwiftBMLSDK_MeetingProtocol.ht.name: directAppURI
Protocols/SwiftBMLSDK_MeetingProtocol.ht.abstract: If the URL for the virtual meeting is one that can open an app on the user’s device, a direct URL scheme version of the URL is returned.

Protocols/SwiftBMLSDK_MeetingProtocol.ht.name: SwiftBMLSDK_MeetingProtocol
Protocols/SwiftBMLSDK_MeetingProtocol.ht.abstract: We have special properties that apply only to specific runtime environments.

Extensions/Array.html#/s:Sa11SwiftBMLSDK.name: subscript(_:)
Extensions/Array.html#/s:Sa11SwiftBMLSDK.abstract: Subscript that allows us to specify a particular meeting type.

Extensions/Array.html#/s:Sa11SwiftBMLSDK.name: subscript(_:)
Extensions/Array.html#/s:Sa11SwiftBMLSDK.abstract: Subscript that allows us to filter for multiple weekdays.

Extensions/Array.html#/s:Sa11SwiftBMLSDK.name: subscript(_:)
Extensions/Array.html#/s:Sa11SwiftBMLSDK.abstract: Subscript that allows us to filter for a single weekday. This is in the local meeting timezone.

Extensions/Array.html#/s:Sa11SwiftBMLSDK.name: subscript(_:)
Extensions/Array.html#/s:Sa11SwiftBMLSDK.abstract: Subscript that allows us to filter for meetings that start within a certain time range. This is in the local meeting timezone.

Extensions/Array.html#/s:Sa11SwiftBMLSDK.name: asJSONData
Extensions/Array.html#/s:Sa11SwiftBMLSDK.abstract: This returns the entire meeting list as a simple, 2-dimensional, JSON Data instance. The data is a simple sequence of single-dimension dictionaries.

Extensions/Array.html#/s:Sa11SwiftBMLSDK.name: allCoords
Extensions/Array.html#/s:Sa11SwiftBMLSDK.abstract: This returns all of the location coordinates in an array of meeting instances.

Extensions/Array.html.name: Array
Extensions/Array.html.abstract: This extension allows us to perform additional operations on an Array of meetings.

Classes/SwiftBMLSDK_MeetingLocalTimezone.name: meeting
Classes/SwiftBMLSDK_MeetingLocalTimezone.abstract: The meeting is a simple stored property. It needs to be a var, in order to allow date caching (getNextStartDate is mutating).

Classes/SwiftBMLSDK_MeetingLocalTimezone.name: nextDate
Classes/SwiftBMLSDK_MeetingLocalTimezone.abstract: This is a smart accessor for the next date. If the date has passed, we fetch it again, before returning it.

Classes/SwiftBMLSDK_MeetingLocalTimezone.name: isInProgress
Classes/SwiftBMLSDK_MeetingLocalTimezone.abstract: This returns true, if the meeting is currently in progress.

Classes/SwiftBMLSDK_MeetingLocalTimezone.name: init(meeting:)
Classes/SwiftBMLSDK_MeetingLocalTimezone.abstract: Initializer. The meeting is immediately asked for the next date.

Classes/SwiftBMLSDK_MeetingLocalTimezone.name: FetchCallback
Classes/SwiftBMLSDK_MeetingLocalTimezone.abstract: The callback from the meeting fetch. This can be called in any thread.

Classes/SwiftBMLSDK_MeetingLocalTimezone.name: CachedMeeting
Classes/SwiftBMLSDK_MeetingLocalTimezone.abstract: Each meeting is an instance, associated with the date of the next occurrence.

Classes/SwiftBMLSDK_MeetingLocalTimezone.name: meetings
Classes/SwiftBMLSDK_MeetingLocalTimezone.abstract: This is the complete response to the last query. We ask for all of the virtual and hybrid meetings at once from the server, and store them in the order received.

Classes/SwiftBMLSDK_MeetingLocalTimezone.name: hybridMeetings
Classes/SwiftBMLSDK_MeetingLocalTimezone.abstract: These are meetings that have both a virtual component, and an in-person (physical location) component.

Classes/SwiftBMLSDK_MeetingLocalTimezone.name: init(serverURL:completion:)
Classes/SwiftBMLSDK_MeetingLocalTimezone.abstract: initializer, with a URL to the server.

Classes/SwiftBMLSDK_MeetingLocalTimezone.name: refreshCaches(completion:)
Classes/SwiftBMLSDK_MeetingLocalTimezone.abstract: This forces the meetings cache to be recalculated from scratch.

Classes/SwiftBMLSDK_MeetingLocalTimezone.name: SwiftBMLSDK_MeetingLocalTimezoneCollection
Classes/SwiftBMLSDK_MeetingLocalTimezone.abstract: This class can be used to manage meetings in the user’s local timezone. It is especially useful for virtual meetings.
